idea_name: How to Spot a Fake Bank Text
idea_text: A video where your friend gets a scam text from a bank they don’t even use.
project_folder: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250711

assets.artwork_prompt: In a cozy living room filled with warm, ambient light filtering through a nearby window, the character stands holding a smartphone, their expression a mix of surprise and skepticism. They are wearing the same rust-colored shirt and dark pants as in the reference image. The room is softly decorated with a comfortable couch and a small coffee table, creating a relaxed atmosphere. The phone screen is subtly visible, displaying a suspicious text message claiming to be from a bank. The background showcases a few green indoor plants, adding a touch of freshness to the scene. The character's eyebrows are slightly raised, and their mouth is just open, conveying a moment of disbelief and curiosity as they realize the message is a scam. The angle is slightly over-the-shoulder, focusing on their reaction while providing a glimpse of the room, emphasizing the personal intrusion of the scam in the comfort of their home.
assets.artwork_path: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250711/artwork.png
assets.script: "Whoa, I just got a text from a bank I don't even use, asking for my details. This has to be a scam! Remember, never share your info unless you're sure it's legit."
assets.audio_path: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250711/audio.mp3
assets.srt_path: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250711/subtitles.srt
